name: purificatory

religion
  specialized Purificatory practices remove bad thoughts and feelings from someone so they become pure (= morally good): After participating in the purificatory ceremony, the novices enter a two-year period of seclusion. He went through many purificatory practices and eventually reached a state of spiritual enlightenment.
having the effect of cleaning something or someone: The treatment cleanses the metabolism through purificatory therapies and rejuvenates the whole body. The fire has had a purificatory effect on the land.
